item.title: Cones In parking, 29th October
item.description:

item.title: Street trees both sides of end of terrace 2 Keslake Road, 29th October
item.description:
We have reported these thirsty street trees many times before as they have overgrown and more than doubled in size the last 2 years latest reference 8262969 dated 7 October. It has now been established by our building insurance experts that these two trees have caused subsidence and structural movement to our vulnerable end of terrace property. You sent us an update on 17 October saying that they are due for pruning. This has become urgent and need to be dealt with immediately and damage has been done to our house and the risk of further damage is now imminent.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Keslake Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
